review: Bought as xmas gift for my Mom so she can wallow in movies on her TV vs. iPad.  Giving this 4 because setting up Netflix was not automatic.  Had to read other reviews to figure out how to do this with error message "Purchase Failure you have previously purchased netflix. If your download hasn't started, it will begin shortly".  Have to do following steps:Step by step instructions:Go to Settings on the home screen.Then arrow to the right until you get to System.Go to about (2nd one down)Go to Check for System Update (last option)Then it works.  If this is known issue for brand new out of the box, not good IMO.  Otherwise, after 30 min. all good and Mom is happy.
